list-item.p: For 5 decades, DMCs have monitored RCTs for safety and benefit.
In 2020, the World Health Organization declared covid-19 disease to be a pandemic.
Numerous trials have emerged to evaluate potential therapeutics and vaccines.
Covid-19 trials bring new challenges to the DMC process, due to the epidemic speed.
Patients are being recruited and outcome data accumulating very rapidly.
DMCs oversight very important for extreme emergencies such as coronavirus epidemics.
